channel.title: Barrage NPCs in wild problem
channel.description: whenever you ice barrage npcs in the wild, it does a ice barrage on everyone around you, hitting up to 99. wth is going on? its like everyone has Ancient staffs, which do the same thing.

item.title: Barrage NPCs in wild problem

item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

whenever you ice barrage npcs in the wild, it does a ice barrage on everyone around you, hitting up to 99. wth is going on? its like everyone has Ancient staffs, which do the same thing.
